metadata.title: CVE-2016-3819 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in codecs/on2/h264dec/source/h264bsd_dpb.c inlibstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 28533562.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
